CardData.FlavorText:
<line-height=100%><size=200%>Y</size>ou have reached the shores of LÃ³rien, but safety is far from assured. Orcs have hounded you since you fled the tower and show no signs of letting up.
<indent=50></indent>Just then, a pair of elves appear from the surrounding woods. Having been aware of your presence since you first stepped foot into the Golden Wood, the protectors are well-prepared to deal with your pursuers.
